segments.source_content: # Canary releases

translations.zh-hant: # Canary 版本

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
import {
  VersionsProvider,
  CanaryVersion,
  StableVersion,
  InsertIfCanaryVersionUnknown,
  InsertIfCanaryVersionKnown,
  PackageJSONDiff,
  PublishTime,
} from "@site/src/components/Versions";

<VersionsProvider>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4015384f

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has a canary releases system.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 設有 Canary 版本發佈機制。

segments.source_content: It permits you to **test new unreleased features** as soon as the pull requests are merged.

translations.zh-hant: 此機制允許您在拉取請求合併後，立即**測試尚未正式發佈的新功能**。

segments.source_content: It is a good way to **give feedback to maintainers**, ensuring the newly implemented feature works as intended.

translations.zh-hant: 這是**向維護者提供反饋**的有效方式，可確保新實現的功能符合預期運作。

segments.source_content:
:::note

Using a canary release in production might seem risky, but in practice, it's not.

A canary release passes all automated tests and is used in production by the Docusaurus site itself.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

在生產環境使用 Canary 版本看似有風險，但實際上並非如此。

Canary 版本已通過所有自動化測試，且 Docusaurus 官方網站本身就在生產環境中使用此版本。

:::

segments.source_content:


:::

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_64b6f348

segments.source_content: ## Canary npm dist tag

translations.zh-hant: ## Canary npm 分發標籤

segments.source_content: For any code-related commit on `main`, the continuous integration will publish a canary release under the `@canary` npm dist tag. It generally takes up to 10 minutes.

translations.zh-hant: 任何提交至 `main` 分支的程式碼變更，持續整合系統將在 10 分鐘內透過 `@canary` npm 分發標籤發佈 Canary 版本。

segments.source_content: You can see on [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core?activeTab=versions) the current dist tags:

translations.zh-hant: 您可在 [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core?activeTab=versions) 查看當前分發標籤：

segments.source_content:
- `latest`: stable releases (Current: <StableVersion />)
- `canary`: canary releases (<CanaryVersion />)

translations.zh-hant:
- `latest`: 穩定版本 (當前: <StableVersion />)
- `canary`: Canary 版本 (<CanaryVersion />)

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Make sure to use the latest canary release and check the publication date (sometimes the publish process fails). <PublishTime />

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

請確認使用最新的 Canary 版本並檢查發佈時間（有時發佈流程可能失敗）。<PublishTime />

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

Canary versions follow the naming convention `0.0.0-commitNumber`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

Canary 版本遵循 `0.0.0-commitNumber` 命名慣例。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Using a canary release

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用 Canary 版本

segments.source_content: Take the latest version published under the [canary npm dist tag](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core?activeTab=versions) (<CanaryVersion />).

translations.zh-hant: 請取用 [canary npm 分發標籤](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core?activeTab=versions) 下發佈的最新版本 (<CanaryVersion />)。

segments.source_content: Use it for all the `@docusaurus/*` dependencies in your `package.json`:

translations.zh-hant: 將此版本號套用至您 `package.json` 中所有 `@docusaurus/*` 相依套件：

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<PackageJSONDiff />
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_092b29bb

segments.source_content: Then, install the dependencies again and start your site:

translations.zh-hant: 接著重新安裝相依套件並啟動您的網站：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install
npm start
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f6563256

segments.source_content: You can also upgrade the `@docusaurus/*` packages with command line:

translations.zh-hant: 您亦可透過指令列升級 `@docusaurus/*` 套件：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save-exact @docusaurus/core@canary @docusaurus/preset-classic@canary
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_19913a56

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Make sure to include all the `@docusaurus/*` packages.

For canary releases, prefer using an exact version instead of a semver range (avoid the `^` prefix).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

請確保包含所有 `@docusaurus/*` 套件。

對於 Canary 版本，建議使用確切版本號而非語意化版本範圍（避免使用 `^` 前綴）。

:::

```mdx-code-block
</VersionsProvider>
```
